transcript:
Customer: Haan boliye na.
Executive: Call disconnect kar raha tha. Ye keh raha tha sir thoda sa
Customer: Jo call pe requirement rahegi aapki. To aap mobile se bhi join kar sakte ho agar chaho to.
Customer: Mobile se happy karo na aap to nahi by lead ka karna kya hai usme?
Executive: Sir usme na matlab dekho buy karenge. Aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai. Hello.
Executive: Abhi aawaz aa rahi hai sir clear?
Customer: Haan haan abhi aa rahi hai. Haan haan sir main keh raha tha jaise kuch by leads na humne bahut India mart me bahut time se by leads consume nahi ki hai. To kuch by leads check karke hume by lead consume karenge aur jo hamare jo past customer hai lead manager me ja kar ke unpe reply karna hai aur sir past leads ka ek option hota hai usme hume past leads pe ja ke I am interested mark karna hoga to na ek system shuru hoga. To baat ye hai sir India mart pura AI based hai artificial intelligence pe chalta hai to na algorithm set karna hai humko.
Customer: Nahi is wajah se keh raha tha. Reply karna thoda sa mushkil ho jayega kyuki uske liye uske paas time bhi nahi hai aur dusra bhi clients hai ek India mart ke through ek Siscon wires karke company hai. To unse recently connect hua tha to unka bhi work order wagera bhi pending hua hai. To filhal by leads to matlab mere ko lag raha hai mushkil hi hai koi accept karna ya lena.
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab main keh raha tha sir discuss karte na hum log thoda dekhte kyuki bahut time se matlab na service utilize nahi hui hai is wajah se aapko leads wagera bhi theek se nahi aayengi. To thoda sa discuss karke aur agar hum isme matlab accept karna hi padega kya accept or reply karna padega?
Executive: Haan matlab ek matlab do clients ko thoda sa reply karna hoga past leads me ja kar ke I am interested mark karna hoga aur do ya teen by leads jo thoda bahut relevant ho bahut jyada matlab ekdam exactly dekhna milna mushkil hai lekin haan thoda bahut relevant hoga na to hum usko buy kar lenge. To sir baat ye hai ek tarike se system aur ek taraf se ek pattern mil jayega system ko bas wo ek karna hai sir. To sir 15 minutes ka time hoga mere paas.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo karne ka issue nahi hai lekin father sahab se uska matlab approval nahi aaya abhi kyuki already bahut sare clients hai. To unhone bola abhi kuch bhi I am interested ya fir kuch bhi acceptance karo hi mat. Kyuki already bahut sare parties ko na mana kar chuke hai hum log. Unko bhi manpower supply ke liye chahiye tha. To us reason ke wajah se.
Executive: Sir baat ye hai na ki system agar nahi system to kya hai ab har cheez system ke according karenge to bhai apna bhi fir kuch bachega nahi na. To wo bhi aap ek hamara bhi point rakho har cheez accept karte jayenge ki ek kar le wo kar le to wo thoda sa mushkil ho jayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir baat pata kya hai main ye kyu karana chah raha hu.
Customer: Haan haan bataye.
Customer: Main aap mere ko paanch minute ka time dijiye main ek baar unse baat kar leta hu fir ye meeting ka hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir theek hai main aapko paanch minute me call back.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing time constraints.

- Father's approval is needed for accepting leads.

- Customer has already refused many parties.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of utilizing service.

- Executive explained how to mark interested leads.

- Executive offered to discuss the matter further.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with his father.

- Executive will call back in 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead manager, approval
